storyInfo: Horn encounters Mandragora again outside the abandoned factory, but owing to their respective goals, neither of them attack the other. Inside the factory, having successfully rescued Heidi, Amiya and the gang try to come up with an evacuation plan before encountering W.

attributes.content: Enemy sighted! She's got steel claws—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: That's one.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You took a Sarkaz down with just one hit? Not bad, Feline. You in the Victorian Army?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Stuff it!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You're strong, not like those Dublinn weaklings. Very well, Feline, you're worthy of dying by my blade!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: —Watch out!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Let's not jump to conclusions about who's dying by whose blade just yet.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Ahh—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Sarkaz, you can't imagine how much I want to end your life right now... Too bad my sword is broken, thanks to your friend there.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda, snap out of it!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking. You want revenge, right? This isn't the time. We promised the Doctor we'd make a ruckus, draw the enemies here, and then leave—
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Heh... Feline, you've killed a Sarkaz or two before! Your life... a Sarkaz will claim your life one day!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I don't care about my life all that much.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If it was up to me, I wouldn't have run away from you people.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: What's gotten into you? You aren't even dodging their Arts!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I can take a few more Sarkaz down before I die...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I shouldn't have brought you here... Don't forget, Vina's still waiting for you down below!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Siege...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: If you want to die, suit yourself, but don't get the Doctor and Amiya killed! You'd bring shame to Vina's name!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Fine. Morgan, tell me. How much longer do we need to hold them?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Five minutes. Then the Doctor said someone would be here to pick us up.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: There's a fight up ahead.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right, don't know who they are, but looks like they beat us to the bunch, fighting the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Blake, do you remember how I said I got away from Dublinn?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You said someone helped you...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Right. I didn't see his face, but I knew he's strong. So strong that he could walk into their campground alone even though there were hundreds of them.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Oh? If he was that strong, why'd he need such a ruckus?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: It's not necessarily him, but he definitely isn't alone. There's a team who've been fighting Dublinn and the Sarkaz in Sudean.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Blake, I've never been so sure—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We aren't the only resistance members left. We... still have friends out there, spreading fire under the night sky.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Should we go help them, then?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: No, we can't change our objective just yet.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let's move up and sneak inside while our friends have the Sarkaz distracted.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn! There's a Dublinn team closing in on you. Watch out! Their leader is... is...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Mandragora.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Soldier.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: A fire...?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Right. They reported to me they heard fighting just now.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Hm. Where are the guards?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Most of them are still here. They haven't been drawn away yet.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I knew it... They came prepared.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Should we proceed, then?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Let's watch the fire outside for the time being. Our operation has begun.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Have everyone get ready.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Remember. This is our only chance.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Hey you! What's this? Did you break the factory's machinery?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Who let you in here... It's you?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hello there.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Heh, I knew you were planning something. Get over here!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Whatever I, of all people, might be planning shouldn't mean anything to a warrior like you.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Ever since the Steam Knights vanished without a trace, and the Knights of the Tower fell one after another, how many warriors are there in Londinium... no, all of Victoria, worthy of your attention?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What's with the flattery all of a sudden, Feline? Trying to get me to let my guard down? You underestimate the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You're right. I can't kill you tonight. Not yet. But that's not going to stop me from sticking this arrowhead against your throat.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: A pampered, high-class lady like you is going to bleed with just a little scratch to your throat, I'm sure.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Haha, I'll let you stand here and watch your friends die one by one. By next morning, you'll've bled completely dry too—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: If... If my blood will satisfy you...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Ahhhh! W-What is this?! My eyes! It burns!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ugh––!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Lady, are you alright?!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: It's just a scratch. It'll stop bleeding soon.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Did you see that? The Sarkaz fell for it! The reagent you told me to keep actually worked!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Let's have him lay down here for a little. Just taking his crossbow and knocking him out almost broke my hand...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are a hardy bunch. If their eyes weren't always full of blood and hatred, he would've noticed you sneaking up to him.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Never mind... Benny, how is everyone else doing?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: We did what you said and took over the factory. We probably won't be able to hold it for too long, though. The Sarkaz are on their way, and they won't fall for this twice.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: We'd better hurry, then.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: General, they're here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Which entrance?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: All three are under attack.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm not surprised.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What about the Dublinn forces?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They're fighting the rebels.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Where's Mandragora?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We haven't seen their leader.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I see. Perhaps she'd be interested in what is about to take place here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What about Hoederer?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I thought you were meant to guard the southwest entrance?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Before I head back to the fight, there is one thing I have to tell you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: *cough*... hah...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: An injured mercenary... Who is he?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: His name is Schwab. We had some dealings with each other, but he betrayed me, leading to some unexpected hiccups.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Betrayed...? That's an awfully terrible way to put it. Hoederer... Have you forgotten who you are?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Maybe you're the one who's forgotten himself, Schwab.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're mercenaries... Hah... we've never been... anything else.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hoederer, she's here... I haven't told her about you... Now don't you see what a great friend I am? Haha... I really can't wait to see... the look on your faces...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I have no idea what you are talking about.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I have no need to listen to a traitor talk.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred—
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hoederer, you needn't explain anything.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: All I need to know is if you still serve me.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No question there.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Good, then. I have a new mission for you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Rockrock, Johnny, Gabby... All of you landed? Good.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Phew... We've made it in. Doctor, are you doing okay?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: I made it through. Somehow.;......;I'm about used to this.

attributes.content: Sorry, I haven't ever had a passenger, and all I could think about was what if the grappling hook couldn't support the two of us.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's why I had to hold you so tight.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: At least we landed safely.;......;I thought you'd be more dependable.

attributes.content: Closure, can you see what's going on inside?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can see everything no problem, Amiya. Even the fur in your ears...
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: *Cough*, why is your drone so close?! I-It's too loud!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides... Why can I hear you speaking through it? Why aren't we using the comms?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The comms could be bugged! I mean, you said Sarkaz commander's a real smart cookie!
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Not my Cloclo-1651 though. It's running an all-new security system. That's right. The one I was installing on the whole ship before we left...
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Cloclo-1651?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Uh... Rockrock...? You don't mind, right? I kind of took some inspiration from your drones...
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: It's okay. I like the name... It's cute.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Awesome!
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Cloclo-... uh, some number... start scanning! Our target—Heidi Thomson!
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Target... The target's not far off. The target... Crap! Sarkaz troops! Enemies closing in!
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Everyone, be careful. Get ready to fight!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What are you people doing here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Are you... rebels? Like a finfish caught in a net... Haha!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, there are a dozen Sarkaz behind him!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rock-17—
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Let me do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black lines—You're the Cautus!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Warrior.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will ask you this. Are you willing to surrender?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Surrender...? Cautus, what kind of joke is that?! Just watching you wield this power makes me sick to my stomach!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'll never let you touch my emotions!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You've seen Arts like this before?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't make me laugh! All the Sarkaz here have seen it before!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'd like to kill you myself... but before that, I have to tell the general...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Uh, someone attacked him from behind? A crossbow bolt... Where from?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Rock-17, aim!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hello, my Self-Salvation Corps friends, and also... my Rhodes Island friends whom I haven't met.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Good evening, everyone.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Lady... Heidi?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's right. We meet at last, Miss Amiya.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I don't have time to explain. Doctor... You're the Doctor, right? You're exactly as Kal'tsit described.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.options: Is that a compliment?;......;A nice description, I hope.

attributes.content: Yes... even your reaction is about what I expected. Doctor, have you thought through how we'll make it out of here?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Over here! They're here! Come—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Urghh—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Quiet down, Sarkaz. I won't let you draw the other fighters here that quickly.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Thanks, Benny. Where are the others?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Milady, we've taken the factory on the south side.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: The methods you taught us are working really well... Even the frailest weavers are managing to fight off the Sarkaz guards.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Everyone's using the tools and machines they're familiar with, after all.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: These factories are ours, Benny. The Sarkaz can't control everything here as easily as they thought.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Lady Heidi... I never expected you to be such a formidable fighter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Amiya...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Please, call me Amiya. Just like Dr. Kal'tsit does.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay, Amiya.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Kal'tsit taught me a lot of things...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: And yes, that includes fighting.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Too bad I wasn't her best student.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I was never able to help her with much.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But I will do my absolute best to help Rhodes Island in this battle, just as I fought alongside the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Another team of Sarkaz soldiers is coming our way.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Right, I don't want to be a killjoy... but things are pretty tense right now. There's not just one team... Uh, it looks like all the Sarkaz fighters in the factory are coming our way.
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.options: They know they lost the building.

attributes.content: Right, Doctor. We did our best, but this bought us very little time.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: That's why I need you to think of a way to get out of this right now...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.options: A friend of ours should be here soon.;He's waiting on the east side already.

attributes.content: A friend...?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: And 'he...?'
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Is it just a single man? Or a whole team?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Doctor, the Sarkaz soldiers that Manfred trained are very hard to deal with. They could be hiding anywhere... We mustn't let our guard down.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Everyone, I... I'm seeing something really strange! It's way too weird! The Sarkaz up ahead are fighting... Uh, I mean, they're fighting other Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Wait, are those... Sarkaz mercs?
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: It's the strange mercenaries... One of them seemed to have lent us a hand this afternoon, too.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Sarkaz mercenaries?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: No, we can't trust them! They're the ones who took Bill this afternoon... *cough*! I...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, calm down. You're still wounded.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: I'm fine, but I can't say that about Bill!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Captain, help me out... They need to understand.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Lady Heidi, you said the Sarkaz mercenaries helped you. Could you be more specific about that?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: It was like they were sending me a signal...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But I wasn't entirely sure...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: What kind of signal?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: All these Victorian soldiers... Should we kill them?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Bloody Dublinn! I'll...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Captain, why aren't you attacking?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Horn! Why are you stopping me? Have you forgotten how many of our brothers and sisters died at their hands?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Before she casts her Originium Arts, the Dublinn Caster always raises her hands.
It was those hands and that staff that took Cello's life... as well as the lives of many other Victorian soldiers.
Horn puts her hand on the crossbow she hid up in her sleeve.
If Mandragora shows any signs of lifting even a single finger, she will immediately pull the trigger.
Or perhaps... she could just pull the trigger now. That doesn't seem like a bad choice either.
She can tell from her opponent's eyes that she is thinking the exact same thing.
What's going on? The southern zone's blown up? You mean, the entire wall? It could only be done from the inside... Dammit!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hurry, let's back them up—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Is this the signal for us to evacuate?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Uh... The Doctor never told me anything... but since the Sarkaz are gone, I guess our mission is over?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You two should go on ahead.
Who's there?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You're with Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I'm taking over from here.
Captain, the Sarkaz evacuated! This is the perfect opportunity! Should we head inside or...?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Horn does not take her hand off her crossbow. Her glare closely follows Mandragora as she leaves.

A single bolt. From this distance, that's all it would take. All she has to do is pull the trigger, and her opponent's chest would be torn open, splattering blood everywhere, just like what happened to Cello.
Having retrofitted this crossbow herself, Horn knows its limits very well, but they're so close to each other. With the two of them now within a hair's distance...
Horn, they're gone.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: I was really worried about controlling myself, Horn... Thanks for holding me back. You're right. We shouldn't fight Dublinn here.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: If we actually started fighting each other, the Sarkaz would've found us.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: I'm surprised Mandragora could hold herself back, though. She was hounding us like crazy... What are they doing?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: What is Dublinn doing?
Horn refuses to analyze this question. Her fingertips are still from the boiling blood. Why didn't she pull the trigger?
Why didn't Mandragora raise her hand?
These voices are clashing in her chest. She can feel a clear sense of regret.
But she can't say that.
That's not what her men want to hear.
Forget Mandragora. She's not our objective.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Okay, Horn. What should we do now? Follow Dublinn inside?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Everyone, we're cancelling our original plan. From here on out, we will stay dark.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Blake, you'll continue to be point man. If you run into any Sarkaz guards, take them down. Robben, you'll follow Blake and provide fire support when necessary.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Everyone else, follow me.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Do you see the opening up ahead? Our Dublinn friends left us that. We should take advantage of it when they're dealing with our enemies.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Remember, we came as a team of five, so we'll leave as a team of five. No... We'll leave this Sarkaz prison with even more of our friends.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Watch my hand signal—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Move out!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: *Cough*... *cough*... What was that explosion? Miss Closure. That wasn't you, was it?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Error—Error—Restarting—
attributes.name: Drone

attributes.content: Err, it wasn't her. She wouldn't have blown up her own drone.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Doctor, is this part of your plan? It's a little... flashy, isn't it?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Doctor, is it...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Look, someone's walking past the dust! It's... It's another Sarkaz! Rock-17—
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Again with the weapons? Not to mention... More fresh meat?
{@nickname}, is this how you always greet your heroes?
Is this Sarkaz one of yours...?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Miss Rockrock, please keep your weapon trained on her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: C'mon, little bunny. It's been aaages! Are you really so heartless? That hurts... it cuts deep, you know?
Mr. Feist, please check for any Originium explosives in our immediate vicinity.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No time. We have people to rescue...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Aw man, what a shame. Looks like we don't have time for proper hellos.
C'mere, Heidi.
You're here for me?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Hey now, can't you at least sound a little more enthusiastic? We only just met, and it's not like you're the biggest fan of {@nickname} anyway.
If it wasn't for that stinking old bitch... the one you love ever so much, asking me to come get you, I wouldn't be here either.
Ask any Sarkaz here, I don't come cheap.
Kal'tsit sent you?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: A Sarkaz mercenary... an explosives expert...
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Are you... W?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Whoa, she told you about me? Should I be breaking down in tears of joy? Look at that, out of all my old friends running around, there's actually somebody who still cares about me.
attributes.name: W
